ShopClues Celebrates World Consumer Rights Day (WCRD)!

Started way back on 15 March 1962 by former US President John F Kennedy, now World Consumer Rights Day is known and celebrated internationally. The day is marked to celebrate solidarity within the international consumer rights movements and takes an awareness theme each year to education consumers. 

ShopClues respects consumer voice and will always work for the betterment of the shopping experiences!

Happy World Consumer Rights Day!

SHOPPING TRIVIA for the day- The ubiquitous shopping cart (that we cant do without) was invented in 1936 by Sylvan Goldman in Ohio USA. Apparently, Goldman was inspired by a folding chair to make the tedious  (really- shopping and tedious?? not for us! :-))job of shopping simpler for his customers.
